title: The .NET 5 Superpowers Tour - Online
eventShortDescription:
A Unified Platform - .NET 5

.NET 4.8 and .NET Core 3.1 will soon be superseded by .NET 5, are you ready for the changes?

There will be just one .NET going forward, and we can help you get ready to use the most powerful and flexible version ever! This one day superpowers covers the basics and numerous other topics including:

  • Web development with ASP.NET Core
  • Data access with Entity Framework Core
  • Working with Azure Services
  • Automated Testing
  • Building Enterprise Apps

You will finish the day with a solid an understanding of why you should be using .NET 5 and the capability to build enterprise apps using the new platform.​
eventDescription:
A Unified Platform - .NET 5

.NET 4.8 and .NET Core 3.1 will soon be superseded by .NET 5, are you ready for the changes?

There will be just one .NET going forward, and we can help you get ready to use the most powerful and flexible version ever! This one day superpowers covers the basics and numerous other topics including:

  • Web development with ASP.NET Core
  • Data access with Entity Framework Core
  • Working with Azure Services
  • Automated Testing
  • Building Enterprise Apps

You will finish the day with a solid an understanding of why you should be using .NET 5 and the capability to build enterprise apps using the new platform.

AGENDA

1. Getting Started with .NET 5 Learn all about .NET 5 supported scenarios, and more.

2. Entity Framework Core .NET 5Enterprise data access with Entity Framework Core.

3. Developing with ASP.NET Core Blazor in .NET 5 Building interactive Web UIs with Blazor.

4. Building SPAs with ASP.NET Core in .NET 5 Learn how to create Single Page Apps using React or Angular on .NET 5.

5. Real-time Asynchronous Communication in .Net 5Explore the support for asynchronous communication protocols including SignalR and GRPC

6. Automated Testing with .NET 5 Learn how to write automated tests using the latest tools and techniques with .NET 5.

7. Azure Services in .NET 5 Learn how to build and deploy a range of Azure services - including Docker Containers, App Services and Function Apps.

8. Clean Architecture with .NET 5 Learn the simplest approach to enterprise application development with Clean Architecture and .NET 5.​
